reasoning: Hypophosphatemia is a heterogeneous metabolic condition including primary genetic forms (X-linked hypophosphatemic rickets ~1-2 per 100k) and acquired forms. Limited epidemiological data available; estimate based on X-linked hypophosphatemia and hospitalized patient surveys. Overall incidence ~0.4 per 100k estimated from registry and clinical data.
source: Carpenter TO. (2005). The expanding family of hypophosphatemic syndromes. J Bone Miner Metab. 23(2):307-313
